original: Udāna 5.6
analyzed: udāna

original: Soṇasutta
analyzed: soṇasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā mahākaccāno avantīsu viharati kuraraghare pavatte pabbate.
analyzed: tena khaḥ pana samayena āyasmā mahākaccānaḥ avantīsu viharati kuraraghare pavatte pabbate

original: Tena kho pana samayena soṇo upāsako kuṭikaṇṇo āyasmato mahākaccānassa upaṭṭhāko hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena soṇaḥ upāsakaḥ kuṭikaṇṇaḥ āyasmataḥ mahākaccānassa upaṭṭhākaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho soṇassa upāsakassa kuṭikaṇṇassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
analyzed: atha kho soṇassa upāsakassa kuṭikaṇṇassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: “yathā yathā kho ayyo mahākaccāno dhammaṁ deseti nayidaṁ sukaraṁ agāraṁ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṁ ekantaparisuddhaṁ saṅkhalikhitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
analyzed: yathā yathā kho ayyaḥ mahākaccānaḥ dhammam deseti na idam sukaram agāram ajjhāvasatā ekanta paripuṇṇam ekanta parisuddham saṅkha likhitam brahmacariyam caritu

original: Yannūnāhaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham kesa massuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni a chādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajeyyanti

original: Atha kho soṇo upāsako kuṭikaṇṇo yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho soṇaḥ upāsakaḥ kuṭikaṇṇaḥ yena āyasmā mahākaccāno tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahākaccānam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho soṇo upāsako kuṭikaṇṇo āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho soṇaḥ upāsakaḥ kuṭikaṇṇaḥ āyasmantam mahākaccānam etat avoca

original: “Idha mayhaṁ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
analyzed: idha bhante rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: ‘yathā yathā kho ayyo mahākaccāno dhammaṁ deseti nayidaṁ sukaraṁ agāraṁ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṁ ekantaparisuddhaṁ saṅkhalikhitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
analyzed: yathā yathā kho ayyaḥ mahākaccānaḥ dhammam deseti na idam sukaram agāram ajjhāvasatā ekanta paripuṇṇam ekanta parisuddham saṅkha likhitam brahmacariyam caritu

original: Yannūnāhaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham kesa massuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni a chādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajeyyanti

original: Pabbājetu maṁ, bhante, ayyo mahākaccāno”ti.
analyzed: pabbājetu ma bhante ayyaḥ mahā kaccāno ti

original: Evaṁ vutte, āyasmā mahākaccāno soṇaṁ upāsakaṁ kuṭikaṇṇaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: evam vutte āyasmā mahākaccānaḥ soṇam upāsakam kuṭikaṇṇam etat avoca

original: “dukkaraṁ kho, soṇa, yāvajīvaṁ ekabhattaṁ ekaseyyaṁ brahmacariyaṁ.
analyzed: dukkaram kho soṇa yāvajīvam eka bhattam eka seyyam brahmacariya

original: Iṅgha tvaṁ, soṇa, tattheva āgārikabhūto samāno buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ anuyuñja kālayuttaṁ ekabhattaṁ ekaseyyaṁ brahmacariyan”ti.
analyzed: tva soṇa tattha iva āgārika bhūtaḥ samānaḥ buddhānam sāsanam anuyuñja kāla yuttam eka bhattam eka seyyam brahmacariyanti

original: Atha kho soṇassa upāsakassa kuṭikaṇṇassa yo ahosi pabbajjābhisaṅkhāro so paṭipassambhi.
analyzed: atha kho soṇassa upāsakassa kuṭikaṇṇassa yaḥ ahosi pabbajja abhisaṅkhāro so paṭipassambhi

original: Dutiyampi kho …pe…
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho pe

original: dutiyampi kho āyasmā mahākaccāno soṇaṁ upāsakaṁ kuṭikaṇṇaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho āyasmā mahākaccāno soṇam upāsakam kuṭikaṇṇam etat avoca

original: “dukkaraṁ kho, soṇa, yāvajīvaṁ ekabhattaṁ ekaseyyaṁ brahmacariyaṁ.
analyzed: dukkaram kho soṇa yāvajīvam eka bhattam eka seyyam brahmacariya

original: Iṅgha tvaṁ, soṇa, tattheva āgārikabhūto samāno buddhānaṁ sāsanaṁ anuyuñja kālayuttaṁ ekabhattaṁ ekaseyyaṁ brahmacariyan”ti.
analyzed: tva soṇa tattha iva āgārika bhūtaḥ samānaḥ buddhānam sāsanam anuyuñja kāla yuttam eka bhattam eka seyyam brahmacariyanti

original: Dutiyampi kho soṇassa upāsakassa kuṭikaṇṇassa yo ahosi pabbajjābhisaṅkhāro so paṭipassambhi.
analyzed: dutiyam pi kho soṇassa upāsakassa kuṭikaṇṇassa yaḥ ahosi pabbajja abhisaṅkhāro so paṭipassambhi

original: Tatiyampi kho soṇassa upāsakassa kuṭikaṇṇassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho soṇassa upāsakassa kuṭikaṇṇassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: “yathā yathā kho ayyo mahākaccāno dhammaṁ deseti nayidaṁ sukaraṁ agāraṁ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṁ ekantaparisuddhaṁ saṅkhalikhitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
analyzed: yathā yathā kho ayyaḥ mahākaccānaḥ dhammam deseti na idam sukaram agāram ajjhāvasatā ekanta paripuṇṇam ekanta parisuddham saṅkha likhitam brahmacariyam caritu

original: Yannūnāhaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham kesa massuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni a chādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajeyyanti

original: Tatiyampi kho soṇo upāsako kuṭikaṇṇo yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: tatiyam pi kho soṇaḥ upāsako kuṭikaṇṇaḥ yena āyasmā mahākaccāno tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahākaccānam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho soṇo upāsako kuṭikaṇṇo āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho soṇaḥ upāsakaḥ kuṭikaṇṇaḥ āyasmantam mahākaccānam etat avoca

original: “Idha mayhaṁ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
analyzed: idha bhante rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: ‘yathā yathā kho ayyo mahākaccāno dhammaṁ deseti nayidaṁ sukaraṁ agāraṁ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṁ ekantaparisuddhaṁ saṅkhalikhitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
analyzed: yathā yathā kho ayyaḥ mahākaccānaḥ dhammam deseti na idam sukaram agāram ajjhāvasatā ekanta paripuṇṇam ekanta parisuddham saṅkha likhitam brahmacariyam caritu

original: Yannūnāhaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyyan’ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham kesa massuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni a chādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajeyyanti

original: Pabbājetu maṁ, bhante, ayyo mahākaccāno”ti.
analyzed: pabbājetu ma bhante ayyaḥ mahā kaccāno ti

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahākaccāno soṇaṁ upāsakaṁ kuṭikaṇṇaṁ pabbājesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahākaccāno soṇam upāsakam kuṭikaṇṇam pabbājesi

original: Tena kho pana samayena avantidakkhiṇāpatho appabhikkhuko hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena avanti dakkhiṇāpathaḥ appabhikkhukaḥ hoti

original: Atha kho āyasmā mahākaccāno tiṇṇaṁ vassānaṁ accayena kicchena kasirena tato tato dasavaggaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātetvā āyasmantaṁ soṇaṁ upasampādesi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā mahākaccānaḥ tiṇṇam vassānam accayena kicchena kasirena tatas tatas dasa vaggam bhikkhu saṅgham sannipātetvā āyasmantam soṇam upasampādesi

original: Atha kho āyasmato soṇassa vassaṁvuṭṭhassa rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ soṇassa vassa vuṭṭhassa rahaḥ gatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: “na kho me so bhagavā sammukhā diṭṭho, api ca sutoyeva me:
analyzed: na kho me saḥ bhagavā sammukhā diṭṭhaḥ api ca su toyā iva me

original: ‘so bhagavā īdiso ca īdiso cā’ti.
analyzed: saḥ bhagavān īdisaḥ ca īdisaḥ ca ati

original: Sace maṁ upajjhāyo anujāneyya, gaccheyyāhaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
analyzed: sace mam upajjhāyaḥ anujāneyya gaccheyya aham tam bhagavantam dassanāya arahantam sammāsambuddhan ti

original: Atha kho āyasmā soṇo sāyanhasamayaṁ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā mahākaccāno tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā soṇaḥ sāyanha samayam paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitaḥ yena āyasmā mahākaccāno tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam mahākaccānam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā soṇo āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho āyasmā soṇaḥ āyasmantam mahākaccānam etat avoca

original: “Idha mayhaṁ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
analyzed: idha bhante rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evam cetasaḥ parivitakkaḥ udapādi

original: ‘na kho me so bhagavā sammukhā diṭṭho, api ca sutoyeva me—
analyzed: na kho me saḥ bhagavā sammukhā diṭṭhaḥ api ca su toyā iva me

original: so bhagavā īdiso ca īdiso cā’ti.
analyzed: saḥ bhagavān īdisaḥ ca īdisaḥ ca ati

original: Sace maṁ upajjhāyo anujāneyya, gaccheyyāhaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
analyzed: sace mam upajjhāyaḥ anujāneyya gaccheyya aham tam bhagavantam dassanāya arahantam sammāsambuddhan ti

original: “Sādhu sādhu, soṇa;
analyzed: sādhu sādhu soṇa

original: gaccha tvaṁ, soṇa, taṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ.
analyzed: gaccha tva soṇa tam bhagavantam dassanāya arahantam sammāsambuddha

original: Dakkhissasi tvaṁ, soṇa, taṁ bhagavantaṁ pāsādikaṁ pasādanīyaṁ santindriyaṁ santamānasaṁ uttamadamathasamathamanuppattaṁ dantaṁ guttaṁ yatindriyaṁ nāgaṁ.
analyzed: dakkhissasi tva soṇa tam bhagavantam pāsādikam pasādanīyam sant indriyam santa mānasam uttama damatha samatha manuppattam dantam guttam yat indriyam nāga

original: Disvāna mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi, appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ puccha:
analyzed: disvāna mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi appa ābādham appa ātaṅkam lahu ṭṭhānam balam phāsu vihāram puccha

original: ‘upajjhāyo me, bhante, āyasmā mahākaccāno bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchatī’”ti.
analyzed: upajjhāyaḥ me bhante āyasmā mahākaccānaḥ bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati appa ābādham appa ātaṅkam lahu ṭṭhānam balam phāsu vihāram pucchati iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā soṇo āyasmato mahākaccānassa bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā
analyzed: eva bhanta iti kho āyasmā soṇaḥ āyasmataḥ mahākaccānassa bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā

original: uṭṭhāyāsanā āyasmantaṁ mahākaccānaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā senāsanaṁ saṁsāmetvā
analyzed: uṭṭhāya āsanā ā yasmantam mahākaccānam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā senāsanam sasāmetvā

original: pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṁ pakkāmi.
analyzed: patta cīvaram ādāya yena sāvatthi tena cārikam pakkāmi

original: Anupubbena cārikaṁ caramāno yena sāvatthi jetavanaṁ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
analyzed: anupubbena cārikam caramānaḥ yena sāvatthi jetavanam anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantam abhivādetvā ekamantam nisīdi

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho āyasmā soṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: eka mantam nisinnaḥ khalu āyasmā soṇaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “upajjhāyo me, bhante, āyasmā mahākaccāno bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, appābādhaṁ appātaṅkaṁ lahuṭṭhānaṁ balaṁ phāsuvihāraṁ pucchatī”ti.
analyzed: upajjhāyaḥ me bhante āyasmā mahākaccānaḥ bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati appa ābādham appa ātaṅkam lahu ṭṭhānam balam phāsu vihāram pucchati iti

original: “Kacci, bhikkhu, khamanīyaṁ, kacci yāpanīyaṁ, kaccisi appakilamathena addhānaṁ āgato, na ca piṇḍakena kilantosī”ti?
analyzed: kacci bhikkhu khamanīya kacci yāpanīya appa kilamathena addhānam āgataḥ na ca piṇḍakena kilantosi iti

original: “Khamanīyaṁ, bhagavā, yāpanīyaṁ, bhagavā, appakilamathena cāhaṁ, bhante, addhānaṁ āgato, na ca piṇḍakena kilantomhī”ti.
analyzed: bhagavā bhagavā appa kilamathena ca āha bhante addhānam āgataḥ na ca piṇḍakena kilantaḥ asmi iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam ānandam āmantesi

original: “imassānanda, āgantukassa bhikkhuno senāsanaṁ paññāpehī”ti.
analyzed: imassa ānanda āgantukassa bhikkhuno senāsanam paññāpehi iti

original: Atha kho āyasmato ānandassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ ānandassa etat ahosi

original: “yassa kho maṁ bhagavā āṇāpeti:
analyzed: yassa kho mam bhagavā āṇāpeti

original: ‘imassānanda, āgantukassa bhikkhuno senāsanaṁ paññāpehī’ti, icchati bhagavā tena bhikkhunā saddhiṁ ekavihāre vatthuṁ, icchati bhagavā āyasmatā soṇena saddhiṁ ekavihāre vatthun”ti.
analyzed: imassa ānanda āgantukassa bhikkhuno senāsanam paññāpehi iti icchati bhagavā tena bhikkhunā saddhim eka vihāre vatthu icchati bhagavā āyasmatā soṇena saddhim eka vihāre vatthunti

original: Yasmiṁ vihāre bhagavā viharati, tasmiṁ vihāre āyasmato soṇassa senāsanaṁ paññāpesi.
analyzed: yasmin vihāre bhagavā viharati tasmin vihāre āyasmataḥ soṇassa senāsanam paññāpesi

original: Atha kho bhagavā bahudeva rattiṁ abbhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā pāde pakkhāletvā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā bahudeva rattim abbhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā pāde pakkhāletvā vihāram pāvisi

original: Āyasmāpi kho soṇo bahudeva rattiṁ abbhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā pāde pakkhāletvā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: āyasmā api kho soṇaḥ bahudeva rattim abbhokāse nisajjāya vītināmetvā pāde pakkhāletvā vihāram pāvisi

original: Atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsasamayaṁ paccuṭṭhāya āyasmantaṁ soṇaṁ ajjhesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā rattiyā paccūsa samayam paccuṭṭhāya āyasmantam soṇam ajjhesi

original: “paṭibhātu taṁ, bhikkhu, dhammo bhāsitun”ti.
analyzed: paṭibhātu ta bhikkhu dhammaḥ bhāsitunti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā soṇo bhagavato paṭissutvā soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikāni sabbāneva sarena abhaṇi.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho āyasmā soṇaḥ bhagavataḥ paṭissutvā soḷasa aṭṭhaka vaggikāni sabbān eva sarena abhaṇi

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmato soṇassa sarabhaññapariyosāne abbhanumodi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā āyasmataḥ soṇassa sarabhañña pariyosāne abbhanumodi

original: “sādhu sādhu, bhikkhu, suggahitāni te, bhikkhu, soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikāni sumanasikatāni sūpadhāritāni, kalyāṇiyāsi vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā.
analyzed: sādhu sādhu bhikkhu suggahitāni te bhikkhu soḷasa aṭṭhakavaggikāni su manasikatāni su upadhāritāni kalyāṇiyā asi vācāya samannāgataḥ vissaṭṭhāya an elagaḷāya atthassa viññāpaniyā

original: Kati vassosi tvaṁ, bhikkhū”ti?
analyzed: kati vassā asi tva bhikkhū ti

original: “Ekavasso ahaṁ, bhagavā”ti.
analyzed: eka vassaḥ aha bhagavā ati

original: “Kissa pana tvaṁ, bhikkhu, evaṁ ciraṁ akāsī”ti?
analyzed: kissa pana tva bhikkhu evam ciram akāsi iti

original: “Ciraṁ diṭṭho me, bhante, kāmesu ādīnavo;
analyzed: ciram diṭṭhaḥ me bhante kāmesu ādīnavaḥ

original: api ca sambādho gharāvāso bahukicco bahukaraṇīyo”ti.
analyzed: api ca sambādhaḥ ghara āvāsaḥ bahu kiccaḥ bahu karaṇīyaḥ iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṁ viditvā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ udānaṁ udānesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etam attham viditvā tāyam velāyam imam udānam udānesi

original: “Disvā ādīnavaṁ loke,
analyzed: disvā ādīnavam loke

original: ñatvā dhammaṁ nirūpadhiṁ;
analyzed: ñatvā dhammam

original: Ariyo na ramatī pāpe,
analyzed: ariyaḥ na ramatī pāpe

original: pāpe na ramatī sucī”ti.
analyzed: pāpe na ramatī suci iti

original: Chaṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: chaṭṭha
